data.title: Videocon d2h channel number list with price
data.meta_description: Here's an in-depth list of channels across various genres and categories available on Videocon d2h along with their channel number and price.
data.text:
By

team91

-

Videocon D2h subscribers get more than 490 channels across various genres and categories such as movies, entertainment, news, sports, kids, fashion and lifestyle, infotainment, and regional content. Here we have shared the complete list of channels currently available on Videocon d2h along with their channel number, price, and video quality. You can also find the list of channels available under different categories and languages.

Table of Contents

FAQs

How can I individually subscribe to a channel on Videocon d2h?

Videocon d2h users can subscribe to individual channels by logging onto the DTH operator’s official website and selecting ‘Create your own pack’ under the ‘My Account’ section. From there, select the preferred channels and you’ll be charged accordingly in your next monthly bill.

Can I purchase channel combos on Videocon d2h?

Channel combos of particular categories can be purchased on Videocon d2h through the DTH operator’s official website. You’ll find a whole selection of channel packs under the “Recharge” section.
